attributes.action: No Confidence in First Minister of Scotland, Nicola Sturgeon MSP
attributes.background: Scotland has a First Minister that is only interested in her own interests rather than Scotland. It's time for a new First Minister and a new Government for Scotland who is focused on the problems facing Scotland like education and health rather than focus on another independence referendum.

rejection.details: You may be able to start a petition to the Scottish Parliament about this. You can contact the clerks of the Public Petitions Committee for advice about this by emailing petitions@scottish.parliament.uk.
